name: mpr.kirke.dev
description: Dashboard and analytics for USDA Mandatory Price Reporting
author: Andrew Kirkegaard <andrew@kirke.dev> (https://github.com/kirkedev)

scripts.dev: TAG=${TAG:-$(git describe --tags --match 'v*' --dirty --always)}; yarn stop && docker compose up --build
scripts.build: TAG=${TAG:-$(git describe --tags --match 'v*' --dirty --always)}; yarn workspace api build && yarn workspace app build
scripts.start: TAG=${TAG:-$(git describe --tags --match 'v*' --dirty --always)}; yarn stop && yarn build && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up
